name: RNmarket
description: An E-commerce single-page app built with Typescript, React, Node.js and PostgreSQL.
author: Jimi Pitk√§niitty

scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.installDependencies: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
